resources.string: Let\'s start with selecting the structure. I believe your structure is likely the State Tax University. But wait for the data to load, check if it\'s indeed the State Tax University (or just STU), and then press the \"Next\" button.

Great! You\'ve chosen the structure %s.
Now, after the data is loaded, select your faculty. For example, if you are studying in the \"Computer Science\" specialty, your faculty is \"Finance and Digital Technologies.\" But due to the peculiarities of the university\'s API, it may be shortened to \"F-T Finance and DT.\" So don\'t be alarmed by the simple lettering, just compare the faculties in the list with yours and choose the correct one.
After successfully selecting your faculty, press the \"Next\" button.

Great! You\'ve chosen the structure %s and the faculty %s.
Now you need to choose the course you are studying. Wait for the data to load, choose your course, and press the \"Next\" button.

Great! We\'re almost done. You\'ve chosen the structure %s, faculty %s, and course %s.
Now you need to choose your group. As in the previous steps, wait for the data to finish loading, then choose your group. After that, press the \"Next\" button and check if everything is correctly specified.

Congratulations! You\'ve provided all the necessary information and selected your group: %s.

If everything is correct, press the \"Confirm\" button and you will be taken to the page with the schedule selection for your group. If necessary, you can change your group in the future.

But if any data does not match, press the \"Back\" button and change what was incorrectly specified.
